item.description:
On Thursday evenings the Athenian Corner presents 'Concerts On The Corner." They also have their regular weekly entertainment, "The Athenian Ensemble" along with belly dancing later in the evening.

Do you like Greek food? Have you always wanted to try it? The food at The Athenian Corner is delicious! The atmosphere is close to family-style. I've hosted events at this venue, and it's always been a good time!

Check out the menu @: www.atheniancorner.com


Music outside begins at 7 - 8pm
Music inside starts at 8pm

* Due to this being a last-minute event, unless I have more than 6 RSVP, I will not be making a reservation. Please be advised that there may be a short wait for a table.
*Parking: the restaurant has a small lot. Otherwise, parking would be on street or garage.

Meetup: at the entrance between 7:30 and 7:45 p.m. My contact # is: 978.289.7679. You can reach me 6:00pm or after.
item.name: Last Minute- Night Out @ The Athenian Corner
